name: zen-subtheme
author: You!
description: The node.js requirements to build this project.
//: The postinstall script is needed to work-around this Drupal core bug: https://www.drupal.org/node/2329453

scripts.postinstall: find node_modules/ -name '*.info' -type f -delete; bundle install; npm shrinkwrap --dev
scripts.test: gulp && git status | grep 'working directory clean' >/dev/null || (echo 'Please commit all changes generated by building'; exit 1)
